thread.title: Carmel

author: Carmel
title: Carmel
text:
Switched to Energia online because they offered one of the cheapest rates for electricity,so I was willing to try this company. Started saving from the first bill, which was down by about â‚¬30. I am waiting with interest to see my second bill.
The service is also very good. I received my information pack quickly, and all the information I needed was easy to read and understand.
